desmoj.core.simulator

Interface TimeFormatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiUnitTimeFormatter, PatternBasedTimeFormatter, SingleUnitTimeFormatter, UTCTimeFormatter

    public interface TimeFormatter
    An object that formats TimeInstant and TimeString objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String buildTimeString(TimeInstant instant)
      Returns the String representation of the given instant of time.
      java.lang.String buildTimeString(TimeSpan span)
      Returns the String representation of the given span of time.
      java.lang.String getUnit()
      The units used to format time span and time instants.

    • Method Detail

      • buildTimeString

        java.lang.String buildTimeString(TimeInstant instant)
        Returns the String representation of the given instant of time.
        Parameters:
        instant - TimeInstant: the instant of time to be formatted
        Returns:
        String: the String representation of the given timeInstant

      • buildTimeString

        java.lang.String buildTimeString(TimeSpan span)
        Returns the String representation of the given span of time.
        Parameters:
        span - TimeSpan: the instant of time to be formatted
        Returns:
        String: the String representation of the given timeSpan.

      • getUnit

        java.lang.String getUnit()
        The units used to format time span and time instants.
        Returns:
        String: The description of the smallest time unit or all time units.
